body:
Below are some easy and simple steps that you can follow to say your prayer.
Make the Right Environment. The best place to pray is a quiet place where no one is there to disturb you. ...
Praise Your God. ...
Ask For Forgiveness. ...
Pray For Blessings. ...
Thank God and Chant “Amen”
